body:
Thought I was doing something wrong with the 'named' filters, but it looks as though all search to hand via scripts no longer function.

Can make a selection, but the chosen card leaves the library and never appears in the hand.
author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)
title: Search to hand not working

comments.body:
This issue was closed by revision ae7bad66f8f4 .

**Status:** Fixed
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

content:
_From [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/) on September 05, 2014 07:59:51_

Thought I was doing something wrong with the 'named' filters, but it looks as though all search to hand via scripts no longer function.

Can make a selection, but the chosen card leaves the library and never appears in the hand.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=680_
